modName: CFM Config for Better Sorting Mod by Headbomb
summary: This fixes some issues with the CFM config included.
descriptionHtml:
Well duh it requires the ff:
Headbomb\'s Better Sorting Mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730
favmenumodder\'s Categorized Favorites Menu:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862
This mod is tailored to my needs and might not suit yours so no hard feelings.
This fixes the ff:
-Waterbreathing
-Invisibility
-Slow Time
Added:
Katana,Katanas (1H) *mods that use Katanas
Linen Cloak,Cloak of, Cloak - (Body) *Cloaks of Skyrim 
Wings (Body) *Angels in Skyrim
Halo, Horns (Head) *Angelic Halos an Demonic Horns

Readded:
-Equipsets which was removed.

Note: I don\'t favorite a lot of stuff so I don\'t know if those are the only issues. Just tell me if you found some.
Credits to favmenumodder and Headbomb!
author: xXShInIgAmIsAmAXx
